thread.title: High schoolers freak out when they see LeBron
thread.title_full: High schoolers freak out when they see LeBron

author: USA TODAY
title: High schoolers freak out when they see LeBron

organizations.name: cleveland cavaliers twitter)  two high school

text:
High schoolers freak out when they see LeBron "That's LeBron! LeBron! Yo, LeBron!" Post to Facebook High schoolers freak out when they see LeBron "That's LeBron! LeBron! Yo, LeBron!"  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/cleveland-central-catholic-high-school-lebron-cavaliers-the-q-quicken-loans-arena-freak-out-wow-video-nba/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   High schoolers freak out when they see LeBron Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 5:28 p.m. ET Feb. 1, 2017 
They really love LeBron James. (Photo: Cleveland Cavaliers Twitter) 
Two high school basketball teams, Cleveland Central Catholic and Garfield Heights, played against each other at The Q in the afternoon on Wednesday before the Cavaliers vs. Timberwolves game. 
Central Catholic won the game by just two points , and then the players got the best surprise: LEBRON JAMES! 
(Warning: There are some expletives used in this video, but you can't blame them. They were really excited.) tfw you finish playing your H.S. game @TheQArena & then someone walks on to get pregame shots up ... and it's @KingJames . ðŸ˜± #ThisIsWhyWePlay pic.twitter.com/Ca8GnzwdhO â€” Cleveland Cavaliers (@cavs) February 1, 2017 
I would've freaked out too. Imagine being those kids, and the families and friends who went to watch them. They just won a game, and now LeBron is shooting on the same court. 
It's also awesome that LeBron walked on the court while players were still there. Maybe it's the usual time he gets shots up before games, but he definitely was the highlight of the day for those boys.
